text: dhlk al'amr aldhy qasasna ealayk min 'iidkhal almuhajirin aljanta, wamin aetudi ealayh wzulm faqad 'udhin lah 'an yuqabil aljani bimithl faelatiha, wala haraj ealayhi, fa'iidha ead aljani 'iilaa 'iidhayih wabaghaa, fa'iina allah yansur almazlum almuetadaa ealayha; 'iidh la yajuz 'an yuetada ealayh bsbb antisafih linafsiha. 'iina allah lefw ghafurin, yaefu ean almudhanibin fala yueajiluhum bialeuqubati, wayaghfir dhunubahuma
